trans-unit.source: Contains parameters that are passed to the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that performs cryptographic computations.
trans-unit.target: 包含傳遞至執行密碼編譯計算的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 的參數。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The CspParameters class represents parameters that you can pass to managed cryptography classes that internally use Microsoft Cryptographic Service Providers (CSPs) from the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: CspParameters 類別表示您可以傳遞給受管理的密碼編譯類別，在內部使用 Microsoft 密碼編譯服務提供者 (Csp) 從 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Classes with names ending in "CryptoServiceProvider" are managed code wrappers for the corresponding CSP.
trans-unit.target: 使用名稱結尾"CryptoServiceProvider 」 的類別是 managed 程式碼包裝函式，以相對應的 CSP。

trans-unit.source: Use the CspParameters class to do the following: - Specify a particular CSP by passing the provider type to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderName> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CspParameters 類別來執行下列動作:-藉由傳遞提供者類型，若要指定特定 CSP<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderName>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify a CSP using an overload of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定使用的建構函式多載的 CSP。

trans-unit.source: - Create a key container where you can store cryptographic keys.
trans-unit.target: -建立可以在其中儲存密碼編譯金鑰的金鑰容器。

trans-unit.source: Key containers provide the most secure way to persist cryptographic keys and keep them secret from malicious third parties.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰容器會提供最安全的方式保存密碼編譯金鑰，並將其保密來自惡意的第三方。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立金鑰容器的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 在金鑰容器儲存非對稱金鑰](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: - Specify whether to create an asymmetric signature key or an asymmetric exchange key using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber> property.
trans-unit.target: -指定是否要建立非對稱簽章金鑰或非對稱交換金鑰使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This form of CspParameters initializes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> field to a value of `24`, which specifies the PROV_RSA_AES provider.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的 CspParameters 初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>欄位的值`24`，以指定 PROV_RSA_AES 提供者。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: This default provider is compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此預設提供者是與相容<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>演算法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>

trans-unit.source: For information about other provider types, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> field.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他提供者類型的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> class with the specified provider type code.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>類別使用指定的提供者類型碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the CspParameters constructor to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CspParameters 建構函式，藉由傳遞數值，表示該提供者指定的提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm, pass a value of `1`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者型別:-若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`1`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> algorithm, pass a value of `13`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`13`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: For information about other provider type values, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> field.
trans-unit.target: 其他提供者類型值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 文件。

trans-unit.source: A provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.
trans-unit.target: 指定的提供者建立類型之提供者類型碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> class with the specified provider type code and name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>類別具有指定的提供者類型程式碼和名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the CspParameters constructor to specify a provider type and name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CspParameters 建構函式來指定提供者類型和名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type.
trans-unit.target: 藉由傳遞數值，表示所需的提供者型別指定提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm, pass a value of `1`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者型別:-若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`1`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> algorithm, pass a value of `13`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`13`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: For information about other provider type values, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> field.
trans-unit.target: 其他提供者類型值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 文件。

trans-unit.source: A provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.
trans-unit.target: 指定的提供者建立類型之提供者類型碼。

trans-unit.source: A provider name.
trans-unit.target: 提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> class with the specified provider type code and name, and the specified container name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>類別指定的提供者類型程式碼和名稱，以及指定的容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the CspParameters constructor to specify a provider type, a provider name, and a container name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CspParameters 建構函式來指定提供者類型、 提供者名稱和一個容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can use the container name to retrieve a key within that container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取該容器內的索引鍵使用的容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type.
trans-unit.target: 藉由傳遞數值，表示所需的提供者型別指定提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm, pass a value of `1`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者型別:-若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`1`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> algorithm, pass a value of `13`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`13`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: For information about other provider type values, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> field.
trans-unit.target: 其他提供者類型值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 文件。

trans-unit.source: The provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.
trans-unit.target: 指定的提供者建立類型提供者類型碼。

trans-unit.source: A provider name.
trans-unit.target: 提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A container name.
trans-unit.target: 容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> class using a provider type, a provider name, a container name, access information, and a handle to an unmanaged smart card password dialog.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>類別使用的提供者類型、 提供者名稱、 容器名稱、 存取資訊和 unmanaged 的智慧卡密碼 對話方塊的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the container name to retrieve a key within that container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取該容器內的索引鍵使用的容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type.
trans-unit.target: 藉由傳遞數值，表示所需的提供者型別指定提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm, pass a value of `1`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者型別:-若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`1`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> algorithm, pass a value of `13`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`13`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: For information about other provider type values, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> field.
trans-unit.target: 其他提供者類型值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 文件。

trans-unit.source: The provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.
trans-unit.target: 指定的提供者建立類型提供者類型碼。

trans-unit.source: A provider name.
trans-unit.target: 提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A container name.
trans-unit.target: 容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents access rights and audit rules for the container.
trans-unit.target: 物件，代表存取權限和稽核規則的容器。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the parent window for a smart card password dialog.
trans-unit.target: 智慧卡密碼對話方塊的父視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> class using a provider type, a provider name, a container name, access information, and a password associated with a smart card key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>類別使用的提供者類型、 提供者名稱、 容器名稱、 存取資訊和智慧卡的索引鍵相關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the container name to retrieve a key within that container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取該容器內的索引鍵使用的容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type.
trans-unit.target: 藉由傳遞數值，表示所需的提供者型別指定提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm, pass a value of `1`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者型別:-若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`1`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> algorithm, pass a value of `13`to the `dwTypeIn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>演算法，傳遞的值具有`13`至`dwTypeIn`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: For information about other provider type values, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType> field.
trans-unit.target: 其他提供者類型值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.ProviderType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 文件。

trans-unit.source: The provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.
trans-unit.target: 指定的提供者建立類型提供者類型碼。

trans-unit.source: A provider name.
trans-unit.target: 提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A container name.
trans-unit.target: 容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.
trans-unit.target: 物件，代表存取權限和稽核規則的容器。

trans-unit.source: A password associated with a smart card key.
trans-unit.target: 智慧卡的索引鍵相關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>物件表示的存取權限和稽核規則的容器。

trans-unit.source: Use the CryptoKeySecurity property to specify a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity> object that manages the creation of discretionary access control lists (DACLS) and system access control lists (SACLS) for a container.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CryptoKeySecurity 屬性來指定<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity>物件管理建立的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 和系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 容器。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"> </xref>物件表示的存取權限和稽核規則的容器。

trans-unit.source: Represents the flags for <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> that modify the behavior of the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: 代表的旗標<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"> </xref> ，修改密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 的行為。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value, or a bitwise combination of enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值或列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Value is not a valid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 值不是有效的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the key container name for <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰容器名稱<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyContainerName field to specify a name for your key container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 KeyContainerName 欄位來指定您的金鑰容器的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can use the container name to retrieve the persisted key within that container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取該容器內的持續性索引鍵使用的容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立金鑰容器的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 在金鑰容器儲存非對稱金鑰](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether an asymmetric key is created as a signature key or an exchange key.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要將非對稱金鑰建立為簽章金鑰或交換金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The KeyNumber field initializes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyNumber%2A> property when you initialize a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object with a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object.
trans-unit.target: KeyNumber 欄位初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyNumber%2A>屬性，當您初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: An exchange key is an asymmetric key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users.
trans-unit.target: 交換金鑰是用來加密工作階段金鑰，使它們可以安全地儲存和與其他使用者交換非對稱金鑰組。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber> value (`1`) to specify an exchange key.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>值 (`1`) 來指定交換金鑰。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 這個值會對應到`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。

trans-unit.source: A signature key is an asymmetric key pair used for authenticating digitally signed messages or files.
trans-unit.target: 簽章金鑰是用來驗證數位簽章的訊息或檔案的非對稱金鑰組。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber> value (`2`) to specify a signature key.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>值 (`2`) 來指定簽章金鑰。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會對應到`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中使用的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the KeyNumber field specifies an exchange key.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，KeyNumber 欄位會指定交換金鑰。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a password associated with a smart card key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與智慧卡金鑰相關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyPassword property to supply a password for a smart card key.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 KeyPassword 屬性以提供智慧卡金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a password using this property, a password dialog box will not be presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定密碼，使用這個屬性時，不會向使用者提供密碼 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: A password associated with a smart card key.
trans-unit.target: 智慧卡的索引鍵相關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定智慧卡密碼對話方塊中的未受管理的父視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the ParentWindowHandle property to specify a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ParentWindowHandle 屬性來指定智慧卡密碼對話方塊中的未受管理的父視窗的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a handle using this property, a smart card password dialog box will be presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定使用這個屬性的控制代碼時，智慧卡密碼 對話方塊會呈現給使用者。

trans-unit.source: You can avoid presenting a smart card password dialog box by explicitly specifying a password by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyPassword%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 藉由明確地使用指定密碼中呈現智慧卡密碼對話方塊中，您可以避免<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyPassword%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyPassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: A handle to the parent window for a smart card password dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 智慧卡密碼 對話方塊的父視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Represents the provider name for <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示提供者名稱<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library for details on provider names.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 MSDN library，以取得詳細資料中的 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 文件的提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Represents the provider type code for <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表提供者類型碼<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the ProviderType field to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用 [提供者類型] 欄位來指定提供者類型藉由傳遞數值，表示該提供者。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> class, pass a value of `1`.
trans-unit.target: WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者型別:-若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>類別中，將值傳遞`1`。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: - To specify a provider compatible with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> class, pass a value of `13`.
trans-unit.target: -若要指定與相容的提供者<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>類別中，將值傳遞`13`。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the provider types and their corresponding numeric values defined in the WinCrypt.h header file.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出提供者類型和其對應的數字值 WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義。

trans-unit.source: |Provider Type|Numeric Value| |-------------------|-------------------| |`PROV_RSA_FULL`|1| |`PROV_RSA_SIG`|2| |`PROV_DSS`|3| |`PROV_FORTEZZA`|4| |`PROV_MS_EXCHANGE`|5| |`PROV_SSL`|6| |`PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL`|12| |`PROV_DSS_DH`|13| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG`|14| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG`|15| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL`|16| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL`|17| |`PROV_DH_SCHANNEL`|18| |`PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS`|20| |`PROV_RNG`|21| |`PROV_INTEL_SEC`|22| |`PROV_REPLACE_OWF`|23| |`PROV_RSA_AES`|24| For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: |提供者類型 |數值 | |-------------------|-------------------| |`PROV_RSA_FULL`|1| |`PROV_RSA_SIG`|2| |`PROV_DSS`|3| |`PROV_FORTEZZA`|4| |`PROV_MS_EXCHANGE`|5| |`PROV_SSL`|6| |`PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL`|12| |`PROV_DSS_DH`|13| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG`|14| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG`|15| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL`|16| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL`|17| |`PROV_DH_SCHANNEL`|18| |`PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS`|20| |`PROV_RNG`|21| |`PROV_INTEL_SEC`|22| |`PROV_REPLACE_OWF`|23| |`PROV_RSA_AES`|24| 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 文件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
